A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film destroys and undoes much of what the original 3 films set out to do and dishonors the characters of the past immensely.  It is an affront to the genius story George Lucas created and it is a clear example of why\, overall\, Hollywood is struggling and suffering.  Weak character\, weak writing\, great special effects\, and a moment here or there that illicits a bit of emotion from the viewer.  Not the life changing saga of deep characters you actually care about.  Could have been worse I guess.  Or I've gotten too old.
